channel.title: Flickering shit
channel.description:
I followed this tut from Run[b][/b]e-Se[b][/b]rve[b][/b]r and now all my interfaces in the wilderness flicker, all text in the client's frame that you can render start flickering. "Level: 1" in the wilderness flickers, "FunPK" flickers, in Fight Pits, the shit in there flickers too. How can I fix this?
Tut link: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/307701-pi-castle-wars-release.html Additions to the tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/332025-addition-castle-wars.html
